name: elevenlabs_tts
description: Convert text to speech using ElevenLabs AI voices
author: Skillbox Team

api_key.title: ElevenLabs API Key
api_key.description: Your ElevenLabs API key from elevenlabs.io

voice_id.title: Voice
voice_id.description: The voice to use for text-to-speech conversion

model_id.title: TTS Model
model_id.description: The TTS model to use for voice synthesis

stability.title: Voice Stability
stability.description: Voice stability - lower values allow for more expressive speech

similarity_boost.title: Similarity Boost
similarity_boost.description: Similarity boost - higher values make the voice more similar to the original

output_format.title: Audio Format
output_format.description: The output audio format and quality

optimize_streaming_latency.title: Streaming Optimization
optimize_streaming_latency.description: Optimize for streaming latency (0-4, higher values = lower latency)

manifest.name: elevenlabs_tts
manifest.description: Convert text to speech using ElevenLabs AI voices
manifest.author: Skillbox Team

functions.name: text_to_speech
functions.description: Convert text to speech using high-quality AI voices. Use this when the user requests audio generation from text.

text.description: The text to convert to speech
